content.rendered: With your stylish, unbreakable coffee mug in hand, make a lifetime of memories. Enjoy while camping, in your RV, on your next hike, keep a Kiosk Signature Ombre Mug at work, or use every day at home while planning your next adventure. Kiosk Kaffee introduces a matte finish mug with the classic kiosk logo embedded in the centre to fit perfectly to your morning kaffee regime. Sip your favourite beverage and represent your best with the Kiosk Signature Ombrè Mug. This easy grip mug makes a great addition to your office desk or home coffee bar and is made of sturdy, fully tempered glass and has either a smooth natural cork band or a splash-proof rubber band to help you hold your hot cup of coffee comfortably.
